summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Portuguese Style of Knitting II (Andrea Wong Knits)
Review Date: 2014/05/11
Store: Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Movies
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.48 x 5.39 x 0.51 inches; 3.03 Ounces', 'Actors': 'Andrea Wong'}
Review Text: Andrea is a great teacher, being clear in her instructions with beautiful photography making it easy to follow along. Just lacks a little polish. Not a deal breaker, but a little more enthusiasm in the voice would make this perfect. However, it's not a deal breaker and the video is worth having if you want the basics of Portuguese knitting.
Review Title: Good instructions, but kind of lack luster
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2018/11/09
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Bharat Nalluri'], 'Producers': ['Robert Mickelson', 'Ian Sharples', 'Susan Mullen', 'Niv Fichman', 'Vadim Jean'], 'Starring': ['Dan Stevens', 'Christopher Plummer', 'Jonathan Pryce'], 'Studio': ['Bleecker Street']}
Review Text: Love a good movie when based on a true story.  This movie did not disappoint at all. Love how the characters developed as the movie progressed. Well done.
Review Title: Excellent!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2019/10/25
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Nisha Ganatra'], 'Producers': ['Mindy Kaling', 'Ben Browning', 'Jillian Apfelbaum', 'Howard Klein'], 'Starring': ['Emma Thompson', 'Mindy Kaling', 'John Lithgow']}
Review Text: Every one needs a "Molly" in his or her life to keep things real.  To those who think it's a little too white, a little too brown, a little too political or predictable, it is what it is folks. Truth is truth and as human beings we haven't really evolved that much in the last 50 plus years.  Get out of your own way naysayers, it was funny and it was intelligent and it also made you think.  Hard to find any entertainment these days that does all of that.
Review Title: It is a Breath of Fresh air!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2020/04/26
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Greta Gerwig'], 'Producers': ['Amy Pascal', 'Denise Di Novi', 'Robin Swicord'], 'Starring': ['Saoirse Ronan', 'Emma Watson', 'Florence Pugh'], 'Studio': ['SONY PICTURES ENTERTAINMENT', 'INC.']}
Review Text: This was a story that would have been very difficult to write for the big screen. Masterfully done, the acting was superb, the story believable (though you might want to read the book first to fully appreciate the challenge met) and the setting perfect. I was a little afraid to watch the movie, was afraid that like many movies based on great books that it would fall far short of expectations, not so this time. This movie makes me want to read the book all over again.  All I can say is Thank you!
Review Title: Well done!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Aeronauts
Review Date: 2020/05/09
Categories: Young Adult Audience, Drama, Anxious, Inspiring
Product Description: ['In 1862, daredevil balloon pilot Amelia Wren (Felicity Jones) teams up with pioneering meteorologist James Glaisher (Eddie Redmayne) to advance human knowledge of the weather and fly higher than anyone in history.']
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Čeština', 'Magyar', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Tom Harper'], 'Producers': ['Todd Lieberman', 'David Hoberman', 'Tom Harper'], 'Starring': ['Felicity Jones', 'Eddie Redmayne', 'Himesh Patel']}

Rating: 5.0

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history reveals a strong preference for high-quality instructional and narrative content across various formats, particularly in movies and educational materials. They consistently rate products favorably, with a notable tendency toward 5.0 ratings, reflecting satisfaction with clarity, storytelling, and character development. The sensitivity to emotional engagement and production quality is evident, as evidenced by comments about instruction clarity in knitting and narrative depth in films.

Common themes in their choices include a preference for true stories and character-driven narratives, while exhibiting openness to diverse perspectives in entertainment. The individual values artistic craftsmanship, as indicated by praise for film adaptations of literature and the portrayal of real-life stories.

Quality emerges as a critical aspect, with positive reviews highlighting superior direction, acting, and production values. Price sensitivity appears minimal, as they opt for quality over quantity, suggesting a willingness to invest in well-made products.

Overall, their core preferences center on thoughtful, meaningful content that resonates emotionally, coupled with a high standard for instructional integrity and production quality.

target_interaction.title: Very cute movie, good family night movie.
target_interaction.text: Not anything like what I expected except that the doctor can talk to animals. After that is was totally unexpected and very delightful. Made me laugh and cry.
